text: Egh ia tintinibar mangɨ mɨdorozir gumazibav mɨkemeghtɨ, me bulmakauba ko sipsipba inigh izɨ. Egh me dagɨar kamɨn dav suegh, da tuegh kagh dar amam. Egh me ghuziba sara dar ameghan koghtɨ, arazir kamɨn me Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn arazir kuram gamizir puvatɨ.” Kamaghɨn amizɨma, dɨmagarir kamnaghɨra, mɨdorozir gumaziba bulmakauba inigha iza danganir kamra dav soke.
